Text:
It is not working, after installation can not open the app. Downloaded free version what works but after applying the MMiSecurity.dll it is the same problem with opening.

Please help. I love this program.

Thank you

saharin, you should uninstall any previous installed versions. and DENY the update after installing this version (better to close the internet connection for this software by firewall). Then apply dll.
This dll working only with this version.
